dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1727 IH: Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Trone (for himself, Mr. Mooney, Mr. Raskin, Ms. Norton, Ms. Wexton, Mr. Connolly, and Mr. Beyer) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act to extend the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission Extension Act.

section.header: Chesapeake and Ohio Canal National Historical Park Commission
section.text: Section 6(g) of the Chesapeake and Ohio Canal Development Act (16 U.S.C. 410yâ€“4(g)) is amended by striking 40 and all that follows through the period at the end and inserting on September 30, 2034..
